mapper.sql: select powerInfoId, powerCode01, powerCode02, powerCode03, powerCode04, powerCode05, powerCode06, powerCode07, powerCode08, powerCode09, powerCode10, powerCode11, powerCode12, powerCode13, powerCode14, powerCode15, powerCode16, powerCode17, powerCode18, powerCode19, powerCode20, powerNum01, powerNum02, powerNum03, powerNum04, powerNum05, powerNum06, powerNum07, powerNum08, powerNum09, powerNum10, powerNum11, powerNum12, powerNum13, powerNum14, powerNum15, powerNum16, powerNum17, powerNum18, powerNum19, powerNum20, remark, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,company,bill_date from sys_powerinfo
mapper.select:
select sys_powerinfo.powerInfoId, sys_powerinfo.powerCode01, sys_powerinfo.powerCode02, sys_powerinfo.powerCode03, sys_powerinfo.powerCode04, sys_powerinfo.powerCode05, sys_powerinfo.powerCode06, sys_powerinfo.powerCode07, sys_powerinfo.powerCode08, sys_powerinfo.powerCode09, sys_powerinfo.powerCode10, sys_powerinfo.powerCode11, sys_powerinfo.powerCode12, sys_powerinfo.powerCode13, sys_powerinfo.powerCode14, sys_powerinfo.powerCode15, sys_powerinfo.powerCode16, sys_powerinfo.powerCode17, sys_powerinfo.powerCode18, sys_powerinfo.powerCode19, sys_powerinfo.powerCode20, sys_powerinfo.powerNum01, sys_powerinfo.powerNum02, sys_powerinfo.powerNum03, sys_powerinfo.powerNum04, sys_powerinfo.powerNum05, sys_powerinfo.powerNum06, sys_powerinfo.powerNum07, sys_powerinfo.powerNum08, sys_powerinfo.powerNum09, sys_powerinfo.powerNum10, sys_powerinfo.powerNum11, sys_powerinfo.powerNum12, sys_powerinfo.powerNum13, sys_powerinfo.powerNum14, sys_powerinfo.powerNum15, sys_powerinfo.powerNum16, sys_powerinfo.powerNum17, sys_powerinfo.powerNum18, sys_powerinfo.powerNum19, sys_powerinfo.powerNum20, sys_powerinfo.remark, sys_powerinfo.del_flag, sys_powerinfo.create_by, sys_powerinfo.create_time, sys_powerinfo.update_by, sys_powerinfo.update_time,sys_powerinfo.company,sys_powerinfo.bill_date, sys_dept.dept_name, sys_dept.leader from sys_powerinfo left join sys_dept on sys_powerinfo.company = sys_dept.dept_id
and sys_powerinfo.company = #{company}
AND date_format(sys_powerinfo.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(sys_powerinfo.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
